alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Pike; Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 2:59PM EDT until June 03 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lackawanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Southwestern Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... West central Pike County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 259 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ledgerdale, or 15 miles south of Honesdale, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sterling, Lehigh, Greentown, Gouldsboro, Angels, Ledgerdale, Arlington, Daleville, Newfoundland and La Anna. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
